questions.q: Who was the first President of the United States?
When was the Declaration of Independence signed?
questions.amp: It was signed on July 4, 1776, in Philadelphia

questions.q: Which president of the United States delivered the Gettysburg Address?
questions.amp: It is considered one of the most famous speeches in history.  Poor-quality photographs actually exist of Lincoln delivering it.

questions.q: Who was the commander of the Union armies in the Civil War?
